title: aoluain
author: aoluain
content: I am looking to buy a classic or vintage wrist watch. During the week I damaged my32 year old Tissot so I'm looking for a replacement.Would love another Tissot brand loyalty and I'm setting a budget of around $400I would also like an automatic one.Other criteria: No Gold or silver plating, doesnt have to be Tissot, can be metal or leather strap.So if anyone has anything to sell let me know.I am in the E.U so preferably sellers in the E.U and I will be paying with BTC
